text: No one is born a great cook, one learns by doing.
author: Julia Child

text: Oh, I adore to cook. It makes me feel so mindless in a worthwhile way.
author: Truman Capote

text: Cooking is all about people. No matter what culture, everywhere around the world people get together to eat.
author: Guy Fieri

text: I'm just someone who likes cooking and for whom sharing food is a form of expression.
author: Maya Angelou

text: After a good dinner one can forgive anybody, even oneâ€™s own relatives.
author: Oscar Wilde

text: I don't mean to brag, I don't mean to boast, but we like hot butter on your breakfast toast.
author: Sugarhill Gang - Rapper's Delight

text: Oh oh, collard greens, three degrees low make it hot for me.
author: Schoolboy-Q - Collard Greens
